attributes.title: Give Superconsciousness Breakthrough To Your Being Or To Doing!
attributes.description:
8 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*LIFESTYLE AND LIFE SUPPORT EACH OTHER’S BEING AND DOING.

*LIFE IS BEING, LIFESTYLE IS DOING.

*YOUR BEING SUPPORTS THE KIND OF YOUR DOING; YOUR DOING SUPPORTS THE KIND OF YOUR BEING.

*YOUR BEING WILL DECIDE WHAT KIND OF ACTIONS YOU ARE DOING AND YOUR CONTINUOUS DOING WILL DECIDE WHAT KIND OF BEING YOU WILL BECOME.

*GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS TO EITHER BEING OR DOING.

*EVEN IF YOU GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO ONE, THE OTHER ONE WILL TRANSFORM.

*IF YOU DECIDE TO DO EVERYTHING AS A SUPERCONSCIOUS LIFE, YOUR BEING WILL TRANSFORM BECAUSE OF YOUR DOING.

*IF YOU DECIDE TO BE A SUPERCONSCIOUS BEING YOU DOING WILL TRANSFORM BECAUSE OF YOUR BEING.

*THE MOST APT STRAIGHT DESCRIPTION ABOUT ME IS THE DESCRIPTION I GAVE YESTERDAY: A SMALL BUT CONTINUOUS UNBROKEN LINEAGE, LIVING STREAM OF ENLIGHTENED MASTERS - GURU SHISHYA PARAMPARA (IN SANSKRIT) - FROM A REMOTE VILLAGE IN INDIA, GONE RIGHT! THE “RIGHT” SHOULD ALWAYS BE TOLD WITH A WINK BECAUSE HE HAS ABSOLUTELY GONE RIGHT!

*WHEN I SAY “RIGHT”, I MEAN THE “QUALITY” RIGHT, NOT THE “DIRECTION” RIGHT. BECAUSE OF THE QUALITY RIGHT, IT HAS GONE RIGHT, LEFT, CENTER, UP, DOWN, ALL OVER THE UNIVERSE!

*KAILASA IS NOTHING BUT “TIRUVANNAMALAI GONE RIGHT”! EVERYTHING HAPPENING IN TIRUVANNAMALAI, I JUST REVIVED IT, MADE IT INTO A LARGER SCALE, AND TOOK IT TO THE WORLD! THAT’S IT!

*WITH THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA, I AM CALLING EVERYONE TO ASSUME BODIES. NOW SUCCESSFULLY, SUBRAHMANYA IS MANIFESTING IN SKANDAMATA. NEXT I AM GOING TO BRING ISAKKI SWAMIGAL.

*ALL THE BIG NAMES, THE ENLIGHTENED BEINGS, I AM GOING TO REQUEST THEM TO LAND AS INCARNATIONS.

*ALL OF THEM GANGED UP AND MADE ME MANIFEST. NOW IT IS MY RESPONSIBILITY TO MAKE THEM MANIFEST! SO A LARGE NUMBER OF ENLIGHTENED BEINGS ARE GOING TO MANIFEST ON PLANET EARTH AS KAILASA.

*I AM GOING TO BRING GAUTAMA ASHRAMA - PERIYA SWAMI, CHINNA SWAMI, KUPPAMMAL, RAGUPATHI YOGI, ISAKKI SWAMIGAL, JNANANANDAGIRI OF TIRUKKOVILOOR, POONDI MAHAN OF KALASAPAKKAM... ALL THOSE WHO WERE INVOLVED IN MY LIFE, WHO BIRTHED ME, NURTURED ME.

*I AM GOING TO BRING THEM! I WILL SAY, “I AM DOING MY WORK, NOW ALL OF YOU COME!” I WILL REQUEST THEM. SURELY THEY WILL COME BECAUSE I OBEYED THEIR WORDS!

*IN VILLAGES THERE IS A MUTUAL AGREEMENT THAT “WHEN YOU ATTEND MY CEREMONY WHEN I INVITE, I WILL COME WHEN YOU INVITE.” I CAME WHEN THEY ALL INVITED, SO WHEN I INVITE THEY ALL HAVE TO COME!

*ACTUALLY I AM BUILDING KAILASA FOR THAT PURPOSE ONLY.

*I WANTED AN ECOSYSTEM WHERE THE STUPID POISONOUS THINGS DON’T EXIST. WHEN I INVITE THEM, I SHOULD MAKE A PROPER HOME FOR THEM TO LAND, SETTLE DOWN HAPPILY, PEACEFULLY AND MANIFEST. I SHOULD BE ABLE TO SUPPORT THEM, NURTURE THEM, SO THEY CELEBRATE HAPPILY. I TRIED MY BEST TO DO IT IN INDIA.

*MANY PEOPLE ARE WAITING IN THE LIST. MY FATHER SAYS HE WANTS TO COME. I AM WAITING FOR THE RIGHT PERSON THROUGH WHOM MY FATHER CAN COME AND BE A PART. I WANTED TO BRING MY FATHER WHEN MY MOTHER IS STILL ALIVE IN THE BODY SO HE CAN RECOGNISE!

*I WANTED TO ESTABLISH THIS AS A LIVING LEGITIMATE SCIENCE AND IT IS POSSIBLE.

*IN TIBETAN BUDDHISM, WHEN THE DALAI LAMA IS BIRTHED, TO THE NEW DALAI LAMA, THEY WILL SHOW THE ITEMS USED BY THE EARLIER DALAI LAMA MIXED WITH OTHER ITEMS. THIS NEW DALAI LAMA SHOULD BE ABLE TO RECOGNISE THE ITEMS USED BY THE EARLIER DALAI LAMA.

*EVEN MY GURUS DID THIS FOR ME. THEY PUT GLITTERING JEWELS ALONG WITH RUDRAKSHA AND I STRAIGHT AWAY PICKED THE RUDRAKSHA!

*PLEASE KEEP YOUR ATMA LINGA IN FRONT OF THE CAMERA SO I CAN SEE IT.

*IF YOU DON’T HAVE ATMA LINGA, YOU CAN BRING ANY SMALL STONE. I WILL DO PRANA PRATISHTHA AND MAKE IT THE ATMA LINGA FOR YOU.

*FIRST LISTEN INTENSELY. I HAVE A BEAUTIFUL SHASTRA PRAMANA:

TRIPURA RAHASYAM, MAHATMYA KHANDAM, 35TH CHAPTER

विधीना पूजिता लिङ्गे येनाहं भक्तिभावतः
तस्मै तदामि सालोक्यं अलप्यं अन्यता जनैः

VIDHEENAA PUJITAA LINGE YENAAHAM BHAKTIBHAAVATAHA
TASMAI TADAAAMI SAALOKYAM ALAPYAM ANYATAA JANAIHI

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4202653743155777
